title: Agent unsure of Richardson's future with Colts
content: Anthony Richardson Sr.'s agent reacted with disappointment with the Colts' decision to name Daniel Jones the starting quarterback and said he's unsure of his client's future with the team.

title: Scottie likes East Lake format: No 'sandbagging'
content: Scottie Scheffler says he prefers the format at this year's Tour Championship over last season's event, where he started with a 2-shot advantage.

title: NASCAR's 2026 schedule includes new street race
content: NASCAR in 2026 will race on a new street course in San Diego, return Chicagoland Speedway to the schedule, move the All-Star race to Dover, Delaware, and end its 38-race season back at Homestead-Miami Speedway.

title: CFP selection committee to use enhanced metrics
content: The College Football Playoff selection committee will announce its first of six rankings Nov. 4 using enhanced metrics to help evaluate schedule strength and how teams perform against their schedule, the CFP announced Wednesday.

title: Texas QB Manning says future plans still unclear
content: Texas quarterback Arch Manning says his playing future -- whether it's remaining with the Longhorns after this season or entering the NFL draft -- has yet to be decided despite recent comments by his grandfather Archie Manning.

title: ChÃ¡vez deported to Mexico for alleged cartel ties
content: Julio CÃ©sar ChÃ¡vez Jr., 39, arrested days after his fight with Jake Paul, has been deported to Mexico, where he's wanted for alleged cartel ties, following his detention in the U.S. for allegedly overstaying his visa and lying on a green card application.

title: Rory: Took home 1,100 Masters flags after win
content: Rory McIlroy said he took all 1,100 pin flags from the Masters Shop after winning at Augusta National in April. "I've waited 17 years to sign that flag in the middle, and I will never complain about doing it."

title: ðŸ‘• A history of soccer's most iconic jerseys
content: How did soccer's most storied clubs become synonymous with something as simple as a color? ESPN relives the kit histories of football's biggest teams.

title: Projecting next year's QB market: Most likely scenarios and long shot possibilities for 12 NFL teams
content: We picked teams with some level of QB1 uncertainty for 2026 and projected two potential outcomes for each: one likely, one not so likely.

title: 32 pick projections, eight months out: Yatesâ€™ early NFL mock draft of Round 1 has some surprises
content: Could Arch Manning go No. 1? Will QBs dominate the first round? Which teams could land playmakers? Field Yates projects next year's opening 32 picks.

title: Why Liberty-Lynx is the best rivalry in the WNBA -- even when they're not 100% healthy
content: Minnesota and New York met four times in 20 days. Here are five things we learned in their WNBA Finals rematches.

title: Don't sleep on them: The 43 players who could break out in 2025
content: We ranked the top 100 college football players, but which other players might do big things this season?

title: Can DJ Lagway become Florida's next great quarterback?
content: In his sophomore season, the signal-caller will try to lead Florida to its first College Football Playoff appearance.

title: Burrow, McConkey among Matt Bowen's top 10 draft targets, Warren among late fliers
content: Matt Bowen ranks the most common players he has been drafting this summer and includes a handful of late-rounders to put on the radar.

title: Are the Colts, Anthony Richardson headed for a breakup? Is there a trade market? What's next?
content: Naming Daniel Jones the starter might have irrevocably damaged the relationship between the Colts and Richardson? Here's what to know.

title: Tour Championship rankings: From Scottie Scheffler all the way to No. 30
content: Who comes in at No. 2 behind Scheffler? Where do U.S. Ryder Cup hopefuls rank? We break down the entire Tour Championship field.

title: To keep up with their rivals, Man United must master the art of offloading players
content: Man United have struggled to maximize value from outgoing transfers. Can they flip the script with Alejandro Garnacho and others before the window closes Sept. 1?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool ready Â£130m move for Isak
content: Liverpool have sanctioned a Â£130m move to land Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: The little-known FIFA rule that gives Isak all the leverage over Newcastle
content: Breaking down a little-known FIFA rule called Article 17. It could be the key to unlocking Isak's future.

title: NBA milestones: Landmarks to watch this season for LeBron, Jokic and others
content: Important milestones to watch ahead of the 2025-26 season, including another historic season from LeBron James and Nikola Jokic.

title: AFC North preview: Ravens favored, but Bengals lurk
content: Can the Bengals overcome the Ravens in the North? Here are all the odds for each team in the division and our favorite bets.

title: Preseason predictions revisited: What we got right, wrong about 2025
content: The summer break is the opportune time to look back on ESPN's predictions and expectations for the 2025 F1 season.

title: Ilona Maher is rugby's biggest star. Can she transform the Women's Rugby World Cup?
content: Ilona Maher became a household name at the 2024 Paris Olympics and is now one of the most visible athletes in global sport. Now comes her next big act at Women's Rugby World Cup.

title: Florida announces retro uniforms for homecoming game against Mississippi State
content: Last worn in 2021, the Gators' throwback threads offer a simplistic twist on the school's iconic blue and orange color scheme.

title: Jalen Brunson, Natalia Bryant star together in new Nike Kobe sneaker ad
content: A key feature of the new Nike Kobe 3 Protro is diamond shapes on the upper and outsole in honor of Natalia.

title: Pickups: Top prospects and save chances to add
content: The players you should be claiming off the waiver wire, including some top prospects making their MLB debuts.

title: Israel To Mobilise Thousands Of Reservists For Expanded Gaza Operation
content: Israel's military said Wednesday that it will call up tens of thousands of reservists and extend the service of others ahead of an expanded military operation it will carry out in Gaza City.

title: After Rekha Gupta Slapped, A Look At Past Attacks On Delhi Chief Ministers
content: Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta was assaulted during a public hearing programme at her Civil Lines camp office on Wednesday morning, in what her office described as a "well-planned conspiracy to kill her."

title: "Misplaced": India Rejects Dhaka's 'Anti-Bangladesh Activities' Claim
content: India in a statement on Wednesday strongly rejected claims made by Bangladesh that members of ousted Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's Awami League were carrying out "anti-Bangladesh" activities on Indian soil.

title: 2 Months After RCB Stampede, Karnataka Assembly Passes 'Crowd Control' Bill
content: Over two months after the stampede that claimed 11 lives in Bengaluru during the RCB's felicitation ceremony on June 4, the Karnataka Assembly passed a new legislation aimed at ensuring safety at mass gatherings and public events.

title: 5 of Family, Including 2 Children, Electrocuted In Maharashtra
content: In a heart-wrenching incident, five members of a family, including two children, lost their lives due to electrocution in Erandol taluka of Maharashtra's Jalgaon district on Wednesday, officials said.

title: Parliament Monsoon Session Highlights: Online Gaming Bill Passed By Lok Sabha Amid Opposition Protests
content: Home Minister Amit Shah introduced three bills - The Government of Union Territories (Amendment) Bill 2025, the Constitution (One Hundred And Thirtieth Amendment) Bill 2025, and the Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation (Amendment) Bill 2025.

title: AAP's "Troll" Jab After BJP MLA Shares 'AI Image' Of Rekha Gupta Attacker
content: The fallout from the assault on Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta deepened today after the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) shared an image linking the attacker to the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP), prompting a fierce counterattack.

title: Woman Attacks Husband With Knife After Fight Over Cooking Food In UP: Cops
content: A woman attacked her husband with a knife after a dispute over cooking food turned ugly in Uttar Pradesh's Ballia district, police said on Wednesday.

title: Day After His Apology, Police Case Against Psephologist Over Maharashtra Data
content: A police case has been filed against Sanjay Kumar, an official from the Centre for the Study of Developing Societies or CSDS, over his controversial social media posts related to Maharashtra elections.

title: Akhilesh Yadav To Join Rahul Gandhi's 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' On August 28: K C Venugopal
content: Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav will participate in the 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar's Sitamarhi on August 28, Congress general secretary K C Venugopal said on Wednesday.

title: "Opportunity To Dream Big": Raghav Chadha Calls For Free Subscription Of Advanced AI Tools
content: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) MP Raghav Chadha on Wednesday demanded the government to provide free subscription of advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude and others to every Indian in the Parliament session.

title: Karnataka Accepts Key Report, To Sub-Categorise Scheduled Castes Into 3 Groups
content: The Karnataka government has formally decided to accept a report by Justice HN Nagmohan Das Commission on internal reservation among Scheduled Castes, but with certain modifications.

title: Mother, Pregnant Daughter Die After Being Hit By Speeding Truck In Maharashtra: Cops
content: A 50-year-old woman and her 27-year-old pregnant daughter were killed after they were hit by a speeding truck while crossing the road in the Nashik road area, police said on Wednesday.

title: Centre Proposes Zero GST On Health, Life Insurance For Individuals
content: The Centre has proposed exempting life and health insurance premium from GST, Bihar Deputy Chief Minister and convenor of insurance GoM Samrat Choudhary said on Wednesday.

title: "Would Like India To Be Global Game-Making Hub": IT Minister On Gaming Bill
content: The online gaming bill will help promote the country as a game manufacturer's destination while also discouraging online gambling, which has destroyed thousands of families, Union IT minister Ashwini Vaishnaw told NDTV today.

title: China In "Opportunistic" Move, Pounces On Cheap Russian Oil, As Indian Demand Dips
content: Chinese refineries have ramped up their crude oil purchases from Russia as demand from India has weakened. Trump has threatened to impose secondary tariffs on goods from countries importing Russian oil in to pressure Moscow to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Congress Leader's 'Morality' Question To Amit Shah, His 'I Resigned' Reply
content: The heated face-off  between the opposition and the government over the bills to remove elected representatives arrested on serious charges and kept in custody for over 30 days also saw a short but sharp exchange between K Venugopal and Amit Shah.

title: India Successfully Test-Fires Agni 5 Ballistic Missile From Odisha
content: India on Wednesday successfully test-fired intermediate range ballistic missile Agni 5 from the Integrated Test Range in Odisha's Chandipur, a defence statement said.

title: Foreign-Branded Phone Sales In China Dip 13.3% In June
content: Sales of foreign-branded phones, including Apple Inc.'s iPhone, declined 31.3% year-on-year in China in June.

title: NHL 26 Be A Pro Mode overhauls presentation and storyline
content: Players can take control of a single skater's career, from the minors to retirement, in Be A Pro Mode.

title: 'Misplaced': India rejects Yunus govt's 'anti-B'desh activities' claim; calls for fair polls
content: India has dismissed Bangladesh's interim government's concerns about anti-Bangladesh activities originating from Indian soil, asserting its policy against allowing political actions targeting other nations. The MEA spokesperson emphasised India's expectation for free and fair elections in Bangladesh. This response follows Bangladesh's army chief's offer to support the interim government in ensuring neutral elections amid shifts in the political landscape.

title: Removal of 'tainted' ministers: Oppn, Centre lock horns over 3 bills; key provisions
content: Amid opposition protests, Amit Shah introduced three significant Bills in the Lok Sabha. These Bills target the removal of Prime Minister, Union ministers, chief ministers, or state ministers if they are arrested for serious crimes and held in custody for 30 days. The proposed amendments cover the Constitution, Union Territories, and Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Acts.

title: 'If West criticises â€¦': Russia slams Trump's 25% 'sanctions' on India
content: Russia has strongly condemned the US for pressuring India to halt Russian crude oil imports, deeming the tariffs 'unjustified' and 'unlawful.' Russian officials affirmed their commitment to uninterrupted oil supplies to India, highlighting a 'special mechanism'.

title: Google Pixel 10 series launched: Price, specifications and more
content: Google has officially launched its Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold, along with the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a. The Pixel 10 series features a triple camera system across all models and is powered by the Google Tensor G5 SoC.

title: Foxconn is no longer Apple's iPhone factory floor, it is now building â€¦
content: Foxconn, known for iPhone production, is changing its business. The company is now focusing on artificial intelligence. It is building AI servers for cloud computing and generative AI. Demand for AI infrastructure is increasing. Foxconn is partnering with Nvidia, Supermicro, and Dell. This move positions Foxconn as a key player in enterprise hardware.

title: Indian student arrivals to US dips: Hereâ€™s how it could cost American students
content: Indian student visa arrivals to the US crashed by 46% in July 2025, triggering major financial alarm across American universities. A combination of visa freezes, heightened digital scrutiny, and immigration fears has led to a sharp drop in international enrolment. As Indian and Chinese students vanish, institutions face a projected $7 billion loss and 60,000 job cuts. The fallout threatens tuition subsidies, course offerings, and scholarshipsâ€”placing the burden squarely on domestic students.

title: Microsoft workers occupy HQ: Protest Israel ties; biggest escalation yet
content: Microsoft employees protested at the company's headquarters in Redmond, demanding an end to its contracts with Israel. The group, "No Azure for Apartheid," renamed the plaza "Martyred Palestinian Children's Plaza" and erected memorials. They are urging Microsoft to divest from Israeli partnerships, alleging the Azure cloud platform aids the Israeli military and contributes to civilian deaths in Gaza.

title: Asia Cup | 'Open your mouth carefully': Bumrah's critics lambasted
content: Mohammed Kaif has strongly supported Jasprit Bumrah's T20I return, dismissing fitness concerns raised during the England Test series. Kaif highlighted Bumrah's match-winning ability across formats and suggested white-ball cricket suits him better due to a manageable workload. He also expressed disappointment over Mohammed Siraj's Asia Cup exclusion, praising his form and wicket-taking ability.

title: 'Nation remembers': Shah slams oppn's uproar over new bills; cites Indira-era amendment
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah criticized the opposition for opposing bills aimed at removing ministers facing serious criminal charges. Shah highlighted Prime Minister Narendra Modi's commitment to fighting political corruption. He mentioned the introduction of a constitutional amendment to ensure ministers cannot govern from jail. The bills have been referred to a Joint Committee of Parliament.

title: â€˜Rockets to Wall Streetâ€™: Muskâ€™s teen prodigy leaves SpaceX; joins Citadel Securities
content: Kairan Quazi, the 16-year-old prodigy who previously worked at SpaceX, is now joining Citadel Securities as a developer in New York City. He chose the quantitative trading firm over AI labs and big tech companies, drawn to the fast-paced environment and intellectual challenges. Quazi will be working on global trading infrastructure, embracing Wall Street's meritocratic culture.

title: 'I was in shock': Delhi CM Rekha Gupta's first reaction after attack
content: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta was attacked during a public hearing. She addressed the incident on X, vowing to continue serving the public. The accused, Sakariya Rajeshbhai Khimjibhai, has been arrested. He has a criminal record. Police are investigating the incident as a planned conspiracy. Security measures for CM Gupta may be reviewed.

title: Close call: Guwahati-Kolkata flight suffers mid-air technical glitch
content: An Alliance Air flight 9I756, en route from Guwahati to Kolkata, made an emergency return to Guwahati Airport due to a mid-air technical issue. The aircraft landed safely, and all passengers were safely deboarded. Airport authorities declared a full emergency, which was later withdrawn after the safe landing.

title: 'Going back to medieval times': Rahul slams new bills tabled in Lok Sabha
content: Rahul Gandhi criticized the Centre's new bills proposing the removal of elected officials facing serious criminal charges, likening it to medieval times. He questioned the sudden resignation and silence of former Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar. Gandhi also voiced support for INDIA blocâ€™s Vice-Presidential candidate, Sudershan Reddy, expressing confidence in his strong campaign.

title: Maharashtra poll row: FIR against psephologist Sanjay Kumar; accused of 'spreading false info'
content: Sanjay Kumar, a psephologist with Lokniti-CSDS, faces legal trouble in Nagpur, Maharashtra, after an FIR was filed against him for allegedly spreading false information related to the assembly elections. The complaint cites multiple sections of the BNS following controversial social media posts.

title: French streamer Jean Pormanove dies at 46, fans outraged
content: French streamer Jean Pormanove, known for his extreme IRL broadcasts, tragically died at 46, sparking grief and outrage. His death followed a grueling Kick marathon, raising concerns about unsafe streaming culture. Fans are sharing disturbing clips, igniting debate on platform accountability and creator safety in the face of toxic content.

title: 'I've settled six wars': Trump calls Netanyahu 'war hero'; says he is one too
content: Donald Trump praised Benjamin Netanyahu for ordering strikes on Iranian nuclear sites. Trump called Netanyahu a war hero. He also suggested he deserved the same title. These comments followed Israeli airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities. The US also deployed bombs against Iran's Fordo facility. Trump claimed to have eased tensions in several global conflicts.

title: Pro-American ideologies pre-requisite for visa, green card? What US agency said
content: Amidst growing concerns, the Trump administration's social media vetting and 'America First' policy are sparking division. Oklahoma plans to screen teachers from liberal states for 'woke' views. Trump criticized museums, including the Smithsonian and the National Museum of African American History and Culture, for focusing on negativity and slavery.

title: Indian cricket | 'When he steps away ...': Ex-batter predicts Rohit's retirement & successor
content: Mohammad Kaif has endorsed Shubman Gill as Rohit Sharma's successor in ODIs, anticipating Rohit's retirement after the 2027 World Cup. Kaif highlighted Gill's impressive run-scoring record and leadership qualities, noting his Test captaincy and T20I vice-captaincy. Gill's maturity and form, particularly during the England series, have solidified his position as a future leader, according to chief selector Ajit Agarkar.

title: Arjun Tendulkar engaged to Saaniya Chandok: Has Sachinâ€™s son shared anything on Instagram?
content: Arjun Tendulkar is reportedly engaged to Saaniya Chandok, though the Tendulkar family has not officially confirmed the news. The intimate ceremony was family-oriented, connecting the Tendulkar and Chandok families. Arjun, who plays for Mumbai Indians and represents Goa in domestic cricket, balances his personal milestone with his developing cricketing career.

title: Chahal vs Dhanashree | 'Million feelings ...': Spinner posts a four-word cryptic message
content: Following Dhanashree Verma's emotional revelations about their divorce and criticism of Yuzvendra Chahal's attire during the court hearing, the cricketer has responded with a cryptic Instagram post. Chahal shared pictures of himself with the caption "Million feelings, Zero words," adding another layer to the public saga. Dhanashree's podcast comments and Chahal's reaction have ignited a social media storm.

title: Reprimand on debut: Big setback for South Africa! Bowler reported for suspect action
content: South Africa's ODI series against Australia began with a victory overshadowed by concerns regarding Prenelan Subrayen's bowling action. The off-spinner, making his debut, was reported for a suspect action and will undergo assessment. This setback impacted South Africa's team balance, especially with Kagiso Rabada's injury.

title: From Murugadoss being slammed to Alia's anti-drug video- Here's top 5 ent news
content: The entertainment industry is currently filled with news. Salman Khan's fans criticized A R Murugadoss for lateness remarks. Alia Bhatt's anti-drug video faced backlash, leading to comment section shutdown. Faissal Khan wants Aamir Khan to take a DNA test. Joseph Radhik shared his favorite photo from Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma's wedding. Swara Bhasker's sexuality remarks have sparked controversy online.

title: Stairway to heaven? The real reason Trump wants peace in Ukraine
content: President Trump, twice impeached, once convicted, and forever a master of spectacle, wants to end the war in Ukraine because he wants to go to heaven."I want to try and get to heaven, if possible," he said on live television. "I'm hearing I'm not doing well. I'm really at the bottom of the totem pole."With that, the most powerful man on Earth confessed that even he was afraid of the next world. Trump was not playing 4D chess. He was bargaining with God.â€‹

title: Lok Sabha ruckus: TMC MP says BJP's Bittu, Rijiju 'attacked, pushed' her
content: Amidst uproar in Lok Sabha over three contentious bills introduced by Amit Shah, Trinamool Congress (TMC) alleged that Union Ministers Ravneet Singh Bittu and Kiren Rijiju assaulted their female MPs. TMC MPs Mitali Bagh and Kalyan Banerjee claimed the ministers physically attacked and pushed them during the protest.

title: 'I resigned before...': Amit Shah hits back at Venugopal's 'morality' attack
content: Amit Shah addressed past accusations in Parliament. This happened during a discussion about new bills. Congress leader KC Venugopal questioned Shah's 2010 arrest. Shah stated he resigned before his arrest. He cited moral responsibility. Shah also mentioned his subsequent acquittal. The bills propose changes related to corruption charges against public officials and amendments to existing laws.

title: Online Gaming Bill 2025 passed in LS: Ban on real money gaming; boost for esports
content: Lok Sabha passed the Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025, amidst opposition protests. The bill aims to regulate online gaming, delighting esports but alarming real money gaming platforms. It proposes a central regulatory body, potentially impacting cricket sponsorships and endorsements. Esports anticipates a boost, gaining legitimacy as it prepares for its Olympic debut in 2027.

title: 'Naidu, Nitish most fearful': Raut's big claim on govt's 'removing PM, CMs' bill
content: Sanjay Raut claims the Centre introduced new bills to deter Nitish Kumar and Chandrababu Naidu from withdrawing support to the NDA government, fearing their opposition to provisions allowing the removal of leaders arrested for serious crimes.

title: Rankings: 35-yr-old South African at No 1; 2 Indians in Top 10, Namibia spinner makes in Top 5
content: Keshav Maharaj has regained the top spot in the ICC ODI bowling rankings, surpassing Kuldeep Yadav, who now ranks third. Namibia's Bernard Scholtz made a significant leap to fourth, marking a milestone for Associate cricket. Shubman Gill remains the top ODI batter, while India's Abhishek Sharma and Tilak Varma lead the T20I batting rankings, showcasing India's dominance in both formats.

title: Attack on Delhi CM: Attempt to murder case filed; accused caught on cam
content: Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta was attacked during a Jan Sunvai, prompting immediate police action and a medical examination for Gupta. The assailant, identified as Rajesh Khimji, had previously been seen surveilling Gupta's residence. While the accused is in custody and his background is being verified, Gupta's condition is stable, and she intends to continue her scheduled programs.

title: Infosys hands out higher bonus! Employees get average 80% payout
content: Infosys has distributed performance bonuses for the April-June quarter to eligible employees, with payouts averaging 80% and ranging from 75-89%. This marks an improvement compared to the previous quarter's disbursement.

title: Want to live longer? Research says THIS simple habit adds years to life
content: At 100 years old, Ruth exemplifies the benefits of exercise in old age, routinely walking four miles daily. Her dedication, along with a healthy diet and ample sleep, inspires others to prioritize their well-being. Research supports her lifestyle, highlighting walking's role in preventing age-related diseases and promoting overall health, proving it's never too late to start.

title: Asia Cup | 'Seems strange': Ex-India batter slams Shreyas Iyerâ€™s exclusion
content: Robin Uthappa has voiced his surprise over Shreyas Iyer's omission from India's Asia Cup squad, despite Iyer's strong performances, including being the leading run-scorer in the Champions Trophy and guiding his IPL teams to successive finals. Chief selector Ajit Agarkar defended the decision, citing squad size limitations.

title: Stephen A. Smith defends Trump; points to Biden for Ukraine-Russia conflict
content: Stephen A. Smith, on his podcast, defended Donald Trump, asserting he didn't initiate the Russia-Ukraine war. Smith argued that Joe Biden, as president during the full-scale conflict, bears responsibility. He further contended that decisions by Barack Obama, regarding Crimea, and Bill Clinton, concerning Ukraine's nuclear disarmament, contributed to the current crisis, emphasizing the importance of upholding promises to Ukraine.

title: Spying for Pakistan: Man detained in Jaisalmer; 4th case from district
content: In Jaisalmer, a 30-year-old man named Jivan Khan has been detained on suspicion of spying for Pakistan. Military Intelligence apprehended Khan, who previously worked at a restaurant within the military area, after he attempted to enter an Army station. Questioning revealed he has relatives in Pakistan.

title: Cricketer penalised for obscenity: Australia spinner reprimanded by ICC - see details
content: Australian leg-spinner Adam Zampa has been reprimanded by the ICC for using inappropriate language during the first ODI against South Africa. Zampa admitted to the offense, which occurred after a misfield. He received one demerit point. South Africa won the match by 98 runs, with Keshav Maharaj taking five wickets.

title: 'If Indian goods can't go to US, they can ...': Russia slams Trump tariffs; calls pressure over oil 'unjustified'
content: Prime Minister Modi and Russian President Putin are scheduled to meet in New Delhi to bolster trade ties, focusing on improved payment systems and the removal of trade barriers. Russia aims to strengthen its economic partnership with India amidst global challenges.

title: Chess | Drama! Dutch No 1 Anish Giri blocks Carlsen's long-time coach on social media
content: A social media clash erupted between Anish Giri and Peter Heine Nielsen after Giri commented on D Gukesh's drawing tendencies. Nielsen criticised Giri's view on player mentality, sparking a heated exchange where Giri referenced Carlsen's playing style and Nielsen's alleged bias. Despite the feud, Giri remains in strong form, recently finishing as runner-up in the Chennai Grand Masters 2025.

title: 'War 2' box office collection day 7: Film to cross Rs 200 crore in India
content: Released on August 14th amidst a box office clash with 'Coolie,' 'War 2' initially lagged behind, earning Rs 51.5 crore on its opening day compared to 'Coolie's' Rs 65 crore. Despite decent weekend numbers, 'War 2' experienced a significant drop on Monday, its fifth day.

title: Cricket | Kohli, Rohit disappear from latest ODI rankings. What happened?
content: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli had curiously dropped out of the latest ICC ODI rankings, with Shubman Gill in the lead among Indian batters. According to ICC rules, players are removed from rankings if they haven't played within a qualifying period, which is 9-12 months for ODIs.

title: Army Chief General Upendra Dwivedi, wife pledge to donate organs after death
content: The couple, who were the chief guests at the event, joined senior dignitaries of the Armed Forces in making the pledge

title: Real Money Games firms quietly assess Bill banning their industry; video game firms welcome move
content: The Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025 poses an existential threat to the pay-to-win space, say RMG firms; video game firms have complained about being confused with RMG, and welcomed the Bill.

title: Bengaluru Urban among top districts with high PM2.5 emissions from diesel generator sets
content: â€˜DG sets, used for power backup across residential, commercial, and industrial sectors, are prominent hyperlocal sources of air and noise pollution throughout India.â€™

title: Passenger surge on Bengaluru metroâ€™s Yellow Line: BMRCL installs safety railings at R.V. Road interchange station
content: After Following Nadaprabhu Kempegowda Interchange (Majestic), RV Road has now become the second station in the city to be fitted with such railings.

title: Bring digital data of all types of lands, including forests, under single geospatial platform for effective monitoring: Karnataka High Court
content: HC directed the setting up of a portal and a mobile app for public to get a comprehensive colour-coded reports on land-use classification, ownership history etc.

title: A person in jail cannot function as PM, CM or Minister: Amit Shah
content: Home Minister says: â€œWhile Prime Minister Modi introduced a constitutional amendment to bring himself into the ambit of law, Congress-led Opposition opposed the Bills to remain above the law and run governments from jailâ€Â

title: International Solar Alliance moots a â€˜Silicon Valley for solarâ€™ in India
content: 17 centres of excellence in as many countries will provide testing, lab training, and a â€˜startup ecosystemâ€™, the Director General of the alliance said

title: Rain takes break in State till August 27
content: First flood warning, however, will remain in place at Prakasam Barrage on Krishna river on Thursday; State Disaster Response Force teams have been stationed in low-lying areas

title: U.P.â€™s Jalalabad to get a new name, itâ€™s Parashurampuri
content: The State government had told the Centre that Jalalabad is known as the birthplace of Parashuram, the saint, and houses an ancient temple dedicated to him

title: IDSFFK to open with Palestinian film From Ground Zero
content: The film, a collective effort of 22 Palestinian directors, captures the scars and resilience of life in Gaza, suffering under Israelâ€™s occupation and relentless attacks.

title: â€˜We are going back to the medieval times,â€™ says Rahul Gandhi on new Bills
content: TMC chief Mamata Banerjee said the Bills seek to â€œfinish the independence of judiciaryâ€ and DMK chief M.K. Stalin says this is how â€œdictatorshipsâ€ beginÂ

title: Compassion of this RPF policewoman knows no rules, bounds  Â
content: Parvathy breastfed a two-month-old baby who was crying inconsolably in its fatherâ€™s arms outside an exam hall in Thiruvananthapuram. The babyâ€™s mother could not leave the exam hall as per rules. The policewomanâ€™s timely intervention drew huge praise from her employer

title: Constitution amendment Bill new experiment in neo-fascist politics: Pinarayi
content: Constitution (130th Amendment) Bill  a Sangh Parivar stratagem for persecuting non-Bharatiya Janata Party State governments in the country, says Chief Minister

title: Wild animal menace: Forest department to install solar-powered hanging fences
content: In the first phase, a 4-km stretch at Vattakkayam in Chakkittappara panchayat will be completed in response to farmersâ€™ grievances

title: Where is former Vice President Dhankhar 'hiding', why is he silent: Rahul Gandhi
content: And then there is a story about why he is in hiding. Why the (former) vice president of India is in a situation where he cannot say a word, one word, and has to hide... everybody knows it, says Congress leader Rahul Gandhi

title: Concern raised over shortage of RTC buses in Dharmavaram for rural students
content: Though the depot has reserved 10 regular services on the routes, only one service is being operated during the peak hours when the students travel the most

title: India successfully test-fires Agni-5 ballistic missile from Odisha
content: Ministry of Defence said the launch validated all operational and technical parameters and was conducted under the aegis of the Strategic Forces Command

title: Kerala Health dept. denies delay in diagnosing and treating amoebic meningoencephalitis
content: Samples are sent to State Public Health Lab for confirmatory diagnosis and for identifying the species responsible for the infection and in no way it delays treatment initiation, the department says

title: NWKRTC bus conductors rewarded for encouraging digital payments
content: To motivate conductors to encourage passengers to do digital payments, the transport corporation has launched a tri-monthly campaign

title: Need new, fully autonomous aviation safety regulator: Parliamentary panel
content: The acute shortage of staff due to a slow recruitment process through UPSC poses an existential threat to Indiaâ€™s civil aviation safety apparatus, panelâ€™s report says

title: Forest staff allege abduction, attack by Srisailam MLA and followers
content: MLA and his followers abducted four forest staff by pushing them into their patrol vehicle, driving away and thrashing them inside the vehicle and later at a guest house, alleges A.P. Joint Forest Officers Association Markapur unit president

title: State government faces embarrassment as Council rejects Souharda Co-op Bill
content: Opposition members object to the annual declaration of assets and liabilities and a few other clauses

title: Thrithala gearing up for peopleâ€™s agricultural fest for Onam
content: The festival coinciding with the Onam celebrations is being held as part of the Sustainable Thrithala Project spearheaded by Minister for Local Administration M.B. Rajesh in his Assembly constituency

title: HC extends restraint on arrest of Vedan to Aug. 25
content: He was recently charged with sexually assaulting a woman doctor multiple times on the promise of marriage

title: Internal quota: Most-backward, microscopic communities disappointed
content: The scrapping of a category that provided 1% quota for 59 microscopic communities and grouping them with the â€˜touchableâ€™ communities of Korama, Koracha, Lambani and Bhovi instead draws criticism

title: Congress pulls out of all-party meeting on building scam
content: The partyâ€™s decision to bar its representatives from joining the delegation compelled UDF members to withdraw midway, leading to their absence at the crucial meeting ahead of the upcoming body polls

title: Three PWD officials suspended over lapses in road maintenance
content: The executive engineer of the Manjeri division, the assistant executive engineer of the Perinthalmanna subdivision, and the assistant engineer of the Perinthalmanna section were suspended

title: TDP and JD(U) support the Bills but express reservation about several â€˜grey areasâ€™ in the legislationsÂ
content: The NDA allies, as per sources, were neither informed nor consulted before the government brought the three constitutional amendment Bills that seek to remove the Prime Minister, Chief Ministers and Ministers from office if they are arrested and detained for serious criminal charges

title: Cyber security laboratory soon in Tirumala, says TTD Chairman
content: Aim is to check cybercrimes related to fake darshan tickets and accommodation, says B.R. Naidu; employees belonging to alien faiths may move to other government organisations or opt for Voluntary Retirement Scheme, he says

title: Constitution (130th Amendment) Bill aims to end countryâ€™s democratic era, says Mamata
content: Trinamool Congress general secretary Abhishek Banerjee says the Bill will never pass as it requires support of two-third MPs of the House

title: Kozhikode MP flags concerns over key road projects with Gadkari
content: Issues raised include missing entry points on the Kozhikodeâ€“Palakkad Greenfield Highway, exclusion of the Kozhikodeâ€“Mysore project, and demands for underpasses and foot overbridges on the Kozhikode Bypass

title: Run special trains to ease NH 544 traffic woes, demands Benny Behanan
content: MP submits a memorandum highlighting the severe traffic chaos caused by ongoing underpass works at Amballur, Perambra, Muringoor, Koratty, and Chirangara to  Union Minister of State for Railways

title: 'Towering figure in Indian jurisprudence': Kharge introduces V-P candidate Reddy to Opposition leaders
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge said the opposition parties decided to field someone who has been dedicated to constitutional principles and Reddy is one such person

title: District-level committees formed to handle compensation claims for dog bites, Kerala govt. tells HC
content: Move in compliance with the Supreme Courtâ€™s directive to replace the Siri Jagan Committee appointed by it in 2016 to adjudicate compensation for victims of dog bites

title: BJP urges government to instruct Dakshina Kannada police not to disturb festival events
content: Police should refrain from seizing mikes and sound systems during the upcoming Ganesh Chaturthi, say Opposition members

title: Football Manager 26 revealed with a new engine and Premier League license
content: football manager 26 has a release window of fall 2025 . the game was previously only possible by modding the game . it will also feature the new engine that was set to be introduced in FM25 before it was cancelled . this will see an overhaul to the game's visuals .

title: MMA pound-for-pound rankings: Chimaev has arrived -- but how high in top 10?
content: Khamzat Chimaev is a middleweight champion at the pound-for-pound rankings . he landed 118 strikes in the opening round of his debut at the Octagon in 2020 . in the first round, he was back at it, building a 68-0 edge in total strikes .

title: Numbers that explain Khamzat Chimaev's UFC championship
content: Khamzat Chimaev smashed the record for most strikes landed in a UFC fight previously held by Max Holloway . the previous record for strikes was 336 by Kamaru Usman in his 2021 bout with Calvin Kattar .

title: The stat that could swing every team's 2025-26 season
content: the new national TV calendar is taking shape . the new season schedule was unveiled this past week . training camps open in just over a month . there are plenty of reasons for the Hawks optimism this season . click here for all the latest NBA news .

title: Who could be the breakout U21 player on each Premier League club?
content: the 15-year-old midfielder impressed in preseason to suggest they might break through into the first team this year . but who could follow suit and make their case this time around? a key difference is that Dowman dazzles with his dribbling, take-ons and speed on the ball and his composure to stand up against senior defenders .

title: NFC North preview: Who gets to double-digit wins? Trust Bears hype?
content: the Detroit Lions went 15-2, defeating the Minnesota Vikings (14-3) on the last day of the regular season to claim the division title . the green Bay Packers won 11 games to get in as a wild card . but even the Bears are well within shouting distance .

title: Top 10 NBA players at 2025 EuroBasket: Where Jokic and Doncic stack up abroad
content: euroBasket 2025 will feature the french and Serbian squads that Team USA beat in the knockout rounds of the 2024 Olympics . heavyweights like Serbia, Germany, France, Greece and Slovenia will have multiple NBA names on their roster . the tournament runs Aug. 27 through Sept. 14 .

title: The Unforgotten: Two QBs and the game that tied them together forever
content: quarterback ONE IS JAY KUTNER . he is a senior, 17 years old, wears no. 5 . his team is playing a preseason scrimmage against a public school . the coach is dissatisfied -- execution or effort, it hardly matters .

title: Jameis and the Big Apple (and Eli too): Winston relishes a day immersed in New York
content: jameis Winston stood on top of a red double-decker bus in the middle of Manhattan . he began belting out lines to the musical "Hamilton" with a massive smile across his face . the 31-year-old was on a tour of the city with super bowl winners and Giants legends .

title: 'Sooner than later': Russian envoy on PM Modi, Putin & Xi trilateral

title: Updated top 100 MLB prospect rankings: There's a new No. 1
content: a lot has changed since the last time we ranked the top MLB prospects . some of the prospects in our ranking are in different places after a busy trade deadline . this is my ranking of these players for the long term, considering their upside, risk and proximity to the big leagues .

title: WNBA Power Rankings: Should the Dream be considered title contenders?
content: the dream are 9-3 since the All-Star break, with their two most recent losses coming by only two points . the Las Vegas Aces have won seven in a row . they have reached at least the semifinals the past six seasons .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: What do NFL scouts think of Arch Manning and what can Texas expect from him?
content: arch Manning will get his chance to be the face of the longhorns this season . he won't get the chance to ease into the starting role as top-ranked Texas will play at defending national champion and no. 3-ranked Ohio State in its season opener on august 30 .

title: Barnwell picks five NFL teams set to decline: Who could miss the playoffs entirely?
